function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of public health interventions associated with certain humidity and temperature conditions","Impact":"Potential for sustained transmission and rapid growth of COVID-19 cases","Mitigation":"Implementation of extensive public health interventions","Technologies":"Public health communication, monitoring, and response systems","People":"Populations in social and climatic vulnerable countries","Owner":"Health authorities and governments"},{"Description":"Suitable temperature and humidity range for the survival and transmission of COVID-19","Impact":"Increased viability and transmission rate of coronaviruses","Mitigation":"Adoption of strict social control measures in colder regions","Technologies":"Temperature and humidity monitoring systems, public health communication","People":"Populations in colder regions","Owner":"Health authorities and governments"},{"Description":"Lack of characterization of exact local temperature and humidity conditions","Impact":"Inability to minimize virus spread in specific local environments","Mitigation":"Conducting local temperature and humidity analysis, developing targeted public health interventions","Technologies":"Local climate monitoring systems, data analysis tools","People":"Populations in areas with unknown temperature and humidity conditions","Owner":"Health authorities and research institutions"}]}
